title: Police officer leaves court as harrowing image of him being run over is shown
text:
A police officer who was left fighting for his life after being run over by a thief who hijacked an unmarked patrol car, left court yesterday when harrowing footage of the incident was shown.

Pc Gareth Phillips who suffered severe injuries including a shattered pelvis, was among several officers who attended reports of a stolen Range Rover in the Moseley area of Birmingham on August 10.

Mubashar Hussain, who had four previous convictions for crimes involving dangerous driving, was Tasered as he tried to restart a stolen Range Rover that had been trapped between two police cars.

Birmingham Crown Court was shown bodycam and helicopter-filmed footage of the 29-year-old struggling with officers who were trying to handcuff as he got out of the 4x4.

But after managing to remove barbs left in his skin from the Taser he broke free from the officers and climbed into the driver's seat of an unmarked police car.
description: A police officer who was left fighting for his life after being run over by a thief who hijacked an unmarked patrol car, left court yesterday when harrowing footage of the incident was shown.
